title: Return Policy
overview: BatteryBrain is committed to customer satisfaction. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return products within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange.

content.description: The product must be in its original condition and packaging.
Returns must be initiated within 30 days of receiving the product.
Contact BatteryBrain customer support to initiate a return.
Pack the product securely in its original packaging.
Ship the product back to the address provided by customer support.
Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after the returned product is received and inspected.
Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used at the time of purchase.

sections.title: Exchanges
sections.content: Exchanges are subject to product availability. If the desired product is not available, a refund will be issued.

faqs.question: How long do I have to return a product?
faqs.answer: You have 30 days from the date of delivery to initiate a return for a full refund or exchange.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay for return shipping?
faqs.answer: Customers are typically responsible for return shipping costs, unless the product is defective or was sent in error. Contact customer support for specific details.

faqs.question: Can I exchange a product for a different model?
faqs.answer: Yes, exchanges are possible subject to product availability. If the desired product is not available, we will issue a refund.
